CHAT.comment: not certain if other children's utterances are correctly identified , but aren't Chi
letter includes name of Chi's school
My name is Franky and go to The dickerman School by Franky Cleckley room 12

Chi has a hard time getting started on this activity. Mot gives him a lot of different ideas about who to write to but Chi rejects them. Chi ends up going off to his room but comes back for more ideas about what to write. Mot follows Chi to his bedroom to help him write the letter; however , this is not recorded. Chi finally writes what Mot seems to have told him to. There is a lot of comotion going on which is very distracting.

asking EXP if Chi made her tired
talking about when she gets tired

asks EXP why she is laughing
